info.name: Workflowy Date tags (for use with Complice)
info.description: Make tagged dates pretty. This is designed for use with the unofficial Complice integration, which will automatically pull in the tasks you have tagged for a given day. Don't just make plans, make them happen!
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog: 
2020-05-27: the style supports queues,stacks, etc, and things like #firstsundays
2018-04-09: the style now colorizes all supported tags, and uses a â†» symbol for repeating tasks.
